      • convertToJson

        private java.lang.String convertToJson(Answer answerObject,
                                       java.lang.String json)
                                throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        Function that converts a Answer object into a JSON String where all the data is written in conformity with JSON conventions
        Parameters:
        answerObject - is the object with all the data about the answer to retrieve to the client
        json - is the String that contains the request, only for logging purposes
        Returns:
        return a JSON String with all the data contained in the object
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException

      • calculator

        private double calculator(Request request)
        Function that calculates the result of the operation specified in the request from the client
        Parameters:
        request - is the Request object that contains all the data from the client request
        Returns:
        return the value resultant from the operation made

      • buildAnswer

        private Answer buildAnswer(java.lang.String operation,
                           double result)
        Function that builds the answer to send to the client, merge the result of the calculation of the operation, the date and hour of the operation and the operation made
        Parameters:
        operation - is the operation made
        result - is the result of the operation
        Returns:
        returns a Answer object that contains all the data referent to the treatment of the request from the client
